# MK SERVER

Create a Minecraft server with the latest build of PaperMC or PurpurMC

###Â Before Starting

> if youre in macOS, run `brew install jq`

> if youre in Linux (Ubuntu/Debian), run `sudo apt install -y jq`

### To install

```sh
sudo make install
```

### To run script

```sh
mkserver
```
